name: Kentucky Garlic Cheese Grits
author: Mark Ky
summary: A wonderful dish that is a favorite for Derby Day (or any day) brunch.
ingredients: 12 ounces shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat milk, egg, garlic powder, and hot pepper sauce in a bowl
Bring water and salt to a boil in a saucepan; cook and stir grits in boiling water until thickened, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove from heat; add butter and about 1/2 of the Cheddar cheese
Stir egg mixture into grits and pour grits into the prepared baking dish
Sprinkle remaining Cheddar cheese over grits
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and grits are set, about 1 hour
Allow grits to cool 20 to 30 minutes before serving
